page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT AROUND NENTHEAD
page.content: The employment situation in our block is shown by the following table:_ {TYPE No. TYPE No. Farmers 8 Miners 5 Agric. Workers 5 HGV & PSV 7 Engineering: Shopkeepers 2 Foundry 6 Clerical/Secr. 6 Fabrication 1 Salesworkers 2 Mechanical 3 Statutory Serv.10 Computing 2 Commercial Serv.3 General 4 Admin./Managers 4 Food,Drink,Tobac.4 Professional 17 Building/Constr. 5 Crafts 2 Labourers 5 Self-employed 15 The three main employers in the village are Wrights,Moredun and School <see pages 6&10>.Other places of work: _{LOCATION No. LOCATION No. Nenthead 36 North Region 17 Alston Moor 41 National 6 Within 20 miles 18 International 2 Job prospects are bleak for 25unempl.
